alert.note: Alert for Scotland (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong Winds With a Period of Snow and Reduced Visibilities Tonight... Northwest winds between 25 and 30 mph will continue, with gusts up to 45 mph at times. This will make for difficult travel for high profile vehicles, especially on north to south roadways. In addition, a brief period of sleet and snow is possible with visibilities in the snow, reduced to a mile or less. Accumulations under an inch on grassy and elevated surfaces is possible. Some slick spots could also develop on bridges and overpasses, as temperatures drop below the freezing mark. Be alert for these changing conditions if traveling late tonight.
